name: Spicy Chicken Mongolian No Rice
description: This Spicy Chicken Mongolian No Rice recipe is perfect for those following a health-conscious, low-carb, and low-sodium diet. Enjoy a deliciously Healthyfied twist on the classic Mongolian dish, featuring fresh vegetables and tender chicken breast for a nutritious meal.
recipeIngredient: 0.50  cup shredded, Lettuce, green leaf, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the carrots, shred the lettuce, slice the cucumbers and radishes, and slice the zucchini.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken breast into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and chicken strips. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is browned and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped carrots, sliced zucchini, and a pinch of salt to the pan. Cook for another 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the chicken and vegetables over a bed of shredded lettuce, topped with sliced cucumbers and radishes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
